definition: flower but no fruit (idiom); handsome exterior but hollow inside/flashy
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
abbr. for China
magnificent/splendid/flowery
old variant of 花[hua1]/flower
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
(negative prefix)/not/no
real/true/honest/really/solid/fruit/seed/definitely

sentences.english: The inflated style itself is a kind of euphemism.
sentences.chinese: 這種華而不實的風格本身就是一種委婉語。

sentences.english: A bauble is a showy ornament of little value.
sentences.chinese: 廉價珠寶是華而不實的裝飾品。

sentences.english: The Beijing government appears to have considered the issue of Olympic white elephants as well.
sentences.chinese: 北京政府似乎也考慮到了奧運會華而不實的問題。

sentences.english: Such comparisons are obviously specious and self-serving.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的比較明顯地華而不實，而且自私自利。

sentences.english: You don't have to chase after those grand and complicating things.
sentences.chinese: 你無需追尋那些華而不實的複雜事物。

sentences.english: But many of the venues proved too big, too expensive and more photogenic than practical.
sentences.chinese: 但很多場所被證明是太大，太貴和華而不實。

definition: to be obsessive/to persist obstinately
unheard of/an extremely rare and unprecedented event
tied up in a bundle on a high shelf/to put sth on the back burner/no longer a high priority
attempting nothing and accomplishing nothing (idiom); without any initiative or drive/feckless
to disdain as beneath contempt (idiom)
to comprehend (new things) by analogy
different routes to the same destination (idiom); fig. different means of achieve the same end
one's own wishful thinking
to rack one's brains for schemes (idiom)/to beat one's brains out
lit. you hoodwink me and I cheat you (idiom); fig. mutual deception/each tries to outwit the other/dog eats dog and devil take the hindmost
to cherish the outmoded and preserve the outworn (idiom); conservative/stickler for tradition
to seize every opportunity/to be full of tricks
to work to no avail (idiom)
to be a tax on (one's mind)/to bother/to trouble/to be concerned
(abbr. for 嘗試錯誤|尝试错误) trial and error/failure
lit. to scratch the outside of the boot (idiom)/fig. beside the point/ineffectual
